name: watering a flower
description:
this is a game about a daydream i had when i was a teenager

it takes 5 - 10 minutes to play

most of the art is watercolor. a lot of the writing is taken from my diary from a few years ago so it's personal and not very good. attributions for the music and sounds are in the readme. i made everything else.

wasd - move
click on green text to continue
esc - quit

my twitter
